law.catch_line: Method of erection of buildings by state educational institutions.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 36, effective July 15, 1996. -- Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, 576, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 20. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4535m-2 to 4535m-8; 4535m-10 to 4535m-12, 4535m-14.
